column5: Hi all, Anyone done a fly out of Red Lake yet this year. Leaving in a couple of days and wondering what the Red Lake areas is doing. Thanks, Bob

Didn't fly out of there but fished that area this past week. Fishing was very good with the fish having spawned and moving out of spawning areas back onto points etc. Found them in 8-13' of water. Weather was typical spring for Canada....cool, occassioanl rain and mixture of clouds and sunshine. Planes were going and coming regularly. Enjoy your trip....would guess fishing will be excellent.
